attributes.action: Void introducing voluntary ID card scheme for students by 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are a student resident in the UK, please be aware of the myths and the real facts of the National Identity scheme. Make an informed choice of whether the Id card will protect your privacy and identity from theft or accumulate massive amounts of linked data on you? How will this affect your every day life? 

We all have a right of free speech. We should all have a choice of how we live our lives. Under surveillance or controlled by a national register?
2010 is when the government plan to roll out the voluntary ID card scheme. Know the facts and pledge to be individual.
